title: Trump Responds to Irma, Bannon Speaks Out: A Closer Look | Jill Kargman
description:
Seth takes a closer look at how President Trump is dealing with the aftermath of Hurricane Irma and a brewing storm in his own party over his decision to strike a deal with Democrats.
Then, Jill Kargman describes her real-life inspiration for the laugh-out-loud moments on Odd Mom Out and getting tattoos with her 79-year-old dad.
